name: Vlad Circus Bundle
summary: Experience the eerie world of Vlad Circus with this chilling bundle! Dive into Vlad Circus: Curse of Asmodeus, a pixel-art horror adventure that unravels the dark origins of Vlad's twisted brother.

name: V-Lover!
summary: You have become a manager at a VTuber production by a twist of fate, tasked with the important mission of nurturing three VTubers. In order to help them reach the pinnacle of the VTuber world, you not only need to carefully manage their schedules but also fulfill their various needs.

name: Vlad Circus: Curse of Asmodeus
summary: Vlad Circus: Curse of Asmodeus drags you into a sordid world of mirrors and shadows where the demon lurks. Dare to take on this macabre pixel-art graphic adventure of horror and madness. Solve puzzles and explore two parallel timelines.

name: Vlak
summary: The task in this 2D game is to control the train and collect various objects with it, which will be attached to the train in the form of a wagon. After hitting a wall or wagon, the level is reset. After collecting all the objects, just go through the gate to the next level.

name: Vlad Voievod Dracula: Dungeons of Egrigoz
summary: A Classicvania (linear Metroidvania) game where you play as Vlad Tepes Dracula, the Voievode (Warlord) of Wallachia. While being a prisoner to the Ottoman Court, Dracula descends into the dungeons of Egrigoz Castle to recruit a great warrior held as prisoner by the Ottoman Turks.

name: Vladik Brutal
summary: Fight under the onslaught of mutated monsters, obsessed soldiers and even darker bosses. Just try to survive and find out what to do next in this life, simultaneously tearing your enemies to pieces.

name: Vlorp
summary: Vlorp is a multiplayer hoverkart collector combat racing adventure game.

name: Vlad the Impaler
summary: Vlad is an interactive graphic-novel with RPG elements where your decisions shape the outcome of your story. Each playthrough offers a different experience and immersive story totalling two hours of content.

name: Vlad Circus: Descend Into Madness
summary: Vlad Circus: Descend into Madness puts your sanity to the test, challenging you to escape a labyrinth of nightmares and torment. Test your mind against a slow burn of puzzles, light survival mechanics, and methodical action.

name: Vlak
summary: A snake-like puzzle game for DOS.

name: V.L.A.D.i.K
summary: Explore the open world, go through different tasks, ride a car, hire people to your gang. All this adventure takes place in the beautiful distant expanses of Russia. Play as an ordinary guy named Vlad.

name: Vladimere's Lhore
summary: A collection of games by Vladimere Lhore.

name: Vlinder Life
summary:
Vlinder Life: Dress up Avatar & Fashion Doll Games is a fashion and lovely dress up and hairstyle games that creates the perfect fashion girls in the heart and the delicate scene that fits her.

In Q3 2020, the iOS version was delisted, while the Google Play version remains available.

name: V Lights
summary: V Lights is a 2D multiplayer horror game with eye-catching graphics. Set strategic traps on your opponent with items, light controls, and dash time.

name: Vlad Voievod Dracula: Dungeons of Edirne
summary: While being in the Ottoman capital of Edirne, Vlad Voievod Dracula descends into the dungeons to save a great warrior sentenced to death, so he might join Dracula to take the crown of Wallachia. A casual relaxing game, in the Vlad Voievod Dracula franchise, that takes place before Episode 1.

name: Vladimir Putin Style
summary: Love Hardbass, Play Balalaika, Ride Bears and Babushkas? Madly admire the alpha male style of walking of President Putin? Then this game is for you! Unique Game for True Patriots, Comrades of Motherland and KGB Lovers! Cheeki Breeki Approved.

name: Vlogger Go Viral
summary: Get ready to become the next Internet sensation in Vlogger Go Viral, the idle clicker game where every tap takes your channel one step closer to the top. Begin with only a dream in your head and a camera in your hands, and climb your way to stardom.

name: Vlinder Avatar Town Simulator
summary:
Dive into the world of Vlinder Avatar Maker Town - the ultimate simulation game that turns your anime dreams into reality! Shape your distinctive anime character and refine their look to perfection in this enthralling simulation journey!

Immerse yourself in this dynamic simulation, where your creativity takes center stage through avatar customization. And that's not all – team up with friends to create a designer club within the game. Engage in thrilling avatar design challenges, make group decisions as a team leader, and witness the incredible success of your club!

name: Vlad Voievod Dracula: Episode 2
summary: A challenging Classicvania game with an instant death - infinite respawn mechanic (and an "easy" mode). It's tactical: you need to understand each challenge, and time your moves for perfect execution. Easy to learn but hard to master. It's about Vlad the Impaler, the real medieval Dracula.

name: Vladiators
summary: Vladiators is a multiplayer and competitive TOBA (tiny online battle arena) in an adult world.

name: Vlobs
summary: A relaxing casual puzzle game all about placing, connecting and popping vlobs.

name: Vlak
summary: Put your doctor on danger money, Vlak is set aboard an alien infested train with no consideration at all for your health or general well-being.

name: Vladimir 2021
summary: Vladimir 2021 is a visual novel game. In it, you will immerse yourself in a short story of the protagonist, whose fate will be decided by your choice. - Interesting and "deep" music - Beautiful design of the game - Short but thought-provoking story

name: Vlad Voievod Dracula: Episode 1 - Manhunt
summary: A tactical action platformer where you play as Vlad “the Impaler”, the historical Dracula, the Lord and Voievod (war commander) of Wallachia. With your knights, you explore medieval Romania (Wallachia, Transylvania and Moldova) castle by castle, to hunt down your enemies!

name: Vlinder Princess
summary:
Have you ever dreamed of your cute anime girls mermaid princess look? Or do you want to be a character creator and avatar creator in gatcha games, chibi games or korean makeup games? It's time to create your own Sweet Princess!

Vlinder Princess is a fashion dress up games for girls. It is especially anime games for girls! In our Vlinder fashion anime dressup games, as a hairdresser & Super Stylist, make and dress your own anime doll character now!

name: Vlinder Gacha
summary:
Love collecting sweet dolls from claw machines? Can't resist trying your luck at the claw machine arcade? Want to become a world-renowned gacha doll designer? Look no further!

Vlinder Gacha is here to make your dreams come true!

Experience the joy of doll-catching and express your creativity by dressing up as a gacha princess and giving your fashion paper dolls makeovers! Join the fun of being a fashion doll designer and download the doll makeup and dress up game for girls now!
